features: Premium Insulated Bottle: Made of 18/8 Food-grade Stainless Steel that’s non-toxic, BPA-free, and odorless, these vacuum insulated bottles keep beverages hot for up to 48 hours and cold 24 hours. Matte coating keeps the exterior nice and dry against sweat, moist, and slip.

Functional Sports Bottle: These water bottle comes with 3 useful lids. Flip straw lid is for hands-free sipping when driving or working without blocking your view. Fast-flow spout lid allows spill-proof swig for instant refreshment after sports. Wide mouth handle lid makes ice cubes and fruits filling easily accessible. 3 lids, full flexibility!

Wide Mouth Jug: 2.16 inches wide mouth allows fast fill-up and 64oz capacity holds enough fluid for a whole-day’s refreshment. Each lid is fitted with a seal ring to ensure 100% leak- and spill-proof, keeping beverages fresh and intact all day without transfer of flavor

A Full Pack: You’ll get 1 x 64oz Sports Bottle, 3 x Lids, 1 x Portable Pouch, 2 x Detachable Straws, 1 x Straw Brush, 1 x Bottle Brush, 1 x Gift Box. Different lids add possibilities to use anywhere at gyms, concerts, picnics, camps. Clean easy with the included brushes to get rid of coffee, tea, and milk. Gift box package makes it a sweet gift for families and friends

Reassuring Customer Care: Buy 1 bottle get 8 accessories and 30 day refund service. If you are not 100% happy with our product, feel free to contact us and we will respond within 24 hours. Tips for use: Hand wash only, do not put in microwave or freezer, keep away from babies and kids when dealing with hot beverages

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 19, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Real Nice Bottle
reviews.reviewText: It can be hit or miss with these, as it seems new brands pop up all the time with questionable quality. Bought this for the annual beach trip, and it was great. The bottle held ice VERY long times, the carry case worked well, the multiple lids all seem good (and no leaks during our usage), and the misc cleaning things were fine. The only thing I noticed is the very bottom feels ‘soft,’ like it would ding very, very easily if not covered by the case or a silicone bottom (the case offers some padding protection, but to be clear a serious drop with the case will likely cause an issue). I just leave ours in the case so no issue at the moment. I wouldn’t want to drop it without some protection though. But honestly that varies by user/usage, so YMMV. Overall, very happy with this purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Sports Thermos-NO leakage
reviews.reviewText: This is a great water thermos for sports...it holds enough water for 2-hr practices and game day! It keeps water cold the entire time, even during the hour days of summer. It's size is good for also cramming into a sports gear bag...easy to haul by the handle and looks nice as well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 15, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Amazing insulated water bottle！！！！48h keep cold！！！
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I started to stop using plastic water bottles, it is not environmentally friendly and not good for our health, so I bought this stainless steel insulated water bottle. It surprised me that I got this bottle at a very cheap price, and also got 3 different types of lids, and even more 5 other accessories(2 brushes, 2 straws, carryable pouch). When I received it, I cleaned the inner tank and it smelled no odor!I read the product description and they said that this insulated water bottle can be kept cold for 48 hours, so I made a test. I filled the whole bottle with ice cubes, after 24 hours, they were still full of ice cubes; two days later, the ice cubes only melted halfway! Even on the third day, the water was still cold, and there were a little ice cubes floating on it. AMAZING! You can freeze all your drinks into ice cubes, and it can keep cold longer.And I don’t need to buy extra cleaning brushes. They are equipped with straws brushes and cleaning brushes, and there is also an extra carryable pouch so that I don’t wear out this beautiful body, I can carry him on my back or take it in my hand. Very convenient!I highly recommended it to my friends, they also like this insulated water bottle very much, we look forward to going out together next time!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best water bottle ever
reviews.reviewText: This is the best water bottle I’ve ever had. Easy to clean and multiple bottles covers. Plus very durable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 10, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars great water bottle, defective strap... safety hazard
reviews.reviewText: I love the water bottle, it's big and insulated, keeps my water cold throughout the day, but I bought this for the convenience of the strap so I wouldn't have to hold it to carry it around because it's so chunky. it seemed to be the perfect solution, untilonly days after using this water bottle I noticed that one side of the strap hardware would come undone for no apparent reason. it was always random and I never was touching it when it would happen, often times it was when I would just pick it up to put it on, but sometimes it would happen when I was already wearing it. it would come undone on this one side and I'd have to re-eclip it. it really began to concern me because I never knew when it would come undone and possibly hurt me when it fell.but I put up with it until today, when the hardware actually broke in half while I was wearing it. I mean I'm lucky it didn't land on my foot, because it was full of water and that could really do damage.I dont want to get rid of this bottle I just want a replacement strap !!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great water bottle for busy people!
reviews.reviewText: My teenage son used this for an outdoor summer music camp at school. Well insulated, It kept his water cold all day while outside in the summer heat. No leaks or spills. Large 64oz capacity. Came with two handles, the one on the side (pictured) which he said made it easy to drink one handed and he also used it to carry it. It also came with a longer strap which he didn't use but could be very useful depending on how you want to carry it. Easy to drink from and easy to clean with the included cleaning brush.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 8, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I bought this for my husband as a birthday present. Once it arrived, I sort of wished I’d bought a half gallon instead - it is big and heavy. But he uses it every day and says the large size is fine. Quality seems good. I like that it came with lid options so he could use the one he prefers.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Keeps water cold
reviews.reviewText: Put ice in it and set it on our back porch for two days. Was very surprised that there was still some ice in it. The temperatures were high 80s and low nineties. Great value

Keeps water cold for a long time, came with everything seen in the picture, no problems with shipping either. Perfect transaction and astounding product that holds a lot of water and is just what I needed
Me agrado mucho. Aún estoy en poder probarlo y ver si lo que mencionan es cierto. Pero si creo vale la pena y lo recomendaria.
Super. Se mantiene frío aún después de 24. horas

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on February 22, 2022
reviews.reviewText: Clever thoughtful design with useful helpful accessories. Excellent quality and pleasing to the eye. Can't fault it.
